description: A robot shooting lasers from it's eyes, and riding a unicorn.
Andrew feeding a carrot to Kalia, a thorough-bread mare.
Sebastion, a buff colored cat, sleeping with his paw over his eyes.
Simone, a rust colored cat, laying in the sun with her belly exposed.
Andrew, kneeling in the park, holding a small box tied with a ribbon.  His dog Eowyn is next to him.
A pictureo f two doremice sharing a nut, instead of a picture of Lauren, who is shy.
Simone, a rust colored cat, standing on her back legs, paying close attention to Lauren, who is on the computer.
